title: ‘Poker Face’ Season 2 Release Schedule: When Do New Episodes Arrive On Peacock?
description: A new season of Poker Face has arrived, and with it a new rotation of famous faces as guest stars. Notable names include Cynthia Erivo, who plays sextuplets, Justin Theroux, Katie Holmes, Giancarlo Esposito, Melanie Lynskey, Tayklor Schilling and many many more. Some of Season 1’s guest stars included Adrien Brody, Charles Melton, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, […]
author: Dessi Gomez
excerpt: Season 2 of 'Poker Face' will unfold on Peacock with several big name guest stars from Cynthia Erivo to Melanie Lynskey.
text: A new season of Poker Face has arrived, and with it a new rotation of famous faces as guest stars. Notable names include Cynthia Erivo, who plays sextuplets, Justin Theroux, Katie Holmes, Giancarlo Esposito, Melanie Lynskey, Tayklor Schilling and many many more. Some of Season 1’s guest stars included Adrien Brody, Charles Melton, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Jameela Jamil, Clea DuVall, Tim Blake Nelson, Tim Meadows, Lil Rel Howery and several others. For more details about new episodes of Poker Face Season 2 and when they come out, read on below: When does Poker Face Season 2 come out? Watch on Deadline The second season of the Rian Johnson and Natasha Lyonne collaboration arrives on Peacock May 8. How many episodes are in Poker Face Season 2? There are twelve episodes in Season 2 of Poker Face. When do new episodes of Poker Face arrive on Peacock? The first three episodes arrived on the streamer May 8, with the rest arriving weekly until July 10. See the full release schedule below: Episode 1 : “The Game Is A Foot” – Thursday,May 8 Episode 2: “Last Looks” – Thursday, May 8 Episode 3: “Whack-A-Mole” – Thursday, May 8 Episode 4: Thursday, May 15 Episode 5: Thursday, May 22 Episode 6: Thursday, May 29 Episode 7: Thursday, June 5 Episode 8: Thursday, June 12 Episode 9: Thursday, June 19 Episode 10: Thursday, June 26 Episode 11: Thursday, July 3 Episode 12: Thursday, July 10 Who is in the cast of Poker Face Season 2? Natasha Lyonne reprises her role of Charlie Cale. Rhea Perlman (Cheers) and Simon Helberg (The Big Bang Theory) will also reprise the roles they played in Season 1. Big-name guest stars in Season 2 include Giancarlo Esposito (Better Call Saul, Parish), Cynthia Erivo (Wicked), Katie Holmes (Our Town, Ray Donovan), Gaby Hoffmann (Transparent, Eric),  Kumail Nanjiani (Welcome to Chippendales, Only Murders in the Building), Kathrine Narducci (Euphoria), Sherry Cola (Shortcomings), Kevin Corrigan (Narcos: Mexico) and Ben Marshall (Saturday Night Live). RELATED: ‘Poker Face’s Natasha Lyonne & Rian Johnson On “Completely Gonzo Bonkers” Season 2 & Which Former Co-Star They Want For Season 3 John Mulaney (John Mulaney Presents: Everybody’s in LA), Ego Nwodim (Saturday Night Live) Sam Richardson (Ted Lasso), Awkwafina (The Farewell), Corey Hawkins (Straight Outta Compton), Simon Rex (Red Rocket) and Cliff “Method Man” Smith (Power Book II: Ghost), have joined Season 2 as guest stars. More guest stars announced in 2025 included Davionte “GaTa” Ganter (Dave), Haley Joel Osment (Blink Twice), John Cho (Searching), Justin Theroux (Beetlejuice Beetlejuice) and Patti Harrison (I Think You Should Leave with Tim Robinson). Still more include Jason Ritter (Matlock), Alia Shawkat (Blink Twice), Carol Kane(Between the Temples), David Krumholtz (Oppenheimer) and Melanie Lynskey(Yellowjackets). Adrienne C. Moore and Taylor Schilling will also appear in Season 2, marking a reunion for the actresses, who starred on Orange Is the New Black together. RELATED: Natasha Lyonne Almost Forgot ‘Poker Face’s John Cho Was In ‘American Pie’: “I Haven’t Seen Those”
html:
A new season of Poker Face has arrived, and with it a new rotation of famous faces as guest stars.

Notable names include Cynthia Erivo, who plays sextuplets, Justin Theroux, Katie Holmes, Giancarlo Esposito, Melanie Lynskey, Tayklor Schilling and many many more. Some of Season 1’s guest stars included Adrien Brody, Charles Melton, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Jameela Jamil, Clea DuVall, Tim Blake Nelson, Tim Meadows, Lil Rel Howery and several others.

For more details about new episodes of Poker Face Season 2 and when they come out, read on below:

When does Poker Face Season 2 come out?

Watch on Deadline

The second season of the Rian Johnson and Natasha Lyonne collaboration arrives on Peacock May 8.

How many episodes are in Poker Face Season 2?

There are twelve episodes in Season 2 of Poker Face.

When do new episodes of Poker Face arrive on Peacock?

The first three episodes arrived on the streamer May 8, with the rest arriving weekly until July 10. See the full release schedule below:

  • Episode 1 : “The Game Is A Foot” – Thursday,May 8
  • Episode 2: “Last Looks” – Thursday, May 8
  • Episode 3: “Whack-A-Mole” – Thursday, May 8
  • Episode 4: Thursday, May 15
  • Episode 5: Thursday, May 22
  • Episode 6: Thursday, May 29
  • Episode 7: Thursday, June 5
  • Episode 8: Thursday, June 12
  • Episode 9: Thursday, June 19
  • Episode 10: Thursday, June 26
  • Episode 11: Thursday, July 3
  • Episode 12: Thursday, July 10

Who is in the cast of Poker Face Season 2?

Natasha Lyonne reprises her role of Charlie Cale. Rhea Perlman (Cheers) and Simon Helberg (The Big Bang Theory) will also reprise the roles they played in Season 1.

Big-name guest stars in Season 2 include Giancarlo Esposito (Better Call Saul, Parish), Cynthia Erivo (Wicked), Katie Holmes (Our Town, Ray Donovan), Gaby Hoffmann (Transparent, Eric),  Kumail Nanjiani (Welcome to Chippendales, Only Murders in the Building), Kathrine Narducci (Euphoria), Sherry Cola (Shortcomings), Kevin Corrigan (Narcos: Mexico) and Ben Marshall (Saturday Night Live).

RELATED: ‘Poker Face’s Natasha Lyonne & Rian Johnson On “Completely Gonzo Bonkers” Season 2 & Which Former Co-Star They Want For Season 3

John Mulaney (John Mulaney Presents: Everybody’s in LA), Ego Nwodim (Saturday Night Live) Sam Richardson (Ted Lasso), Awkwafina (The Farewell), Corey Hawkins (Straight Outta Compton), Simon Rex (Red Rocket) and Cliff “Method Man” Smith (Power Book II: Ghost), have joined Season 2 as guest stars.

More guest stars announced in 2025 included Davionte “GaTa” Ganter (Dave), Haley Joel Osment (Blink Twice), John Cho (Searching), Justin Theroux (Beetlejuice Beetlejuice) and Patti Harrison (I Think You Should Leave with Tim Robinson). Still more include Jason Ritter (Matlock), Alia Shawkat (Blink Twice), Carol Kane(Between the Temples), David Krumholtz (Oppenheimer) and Melanie Lynskey(Yellowjackets).

Adrienne C. Moore and Taylor Schilling will also appear in Season 2, marking a reunion for the actresses, who starred on Orange Is the New Black together.

RELATED: Natasha Lyonne Almost Forgot ‘Poker Face’s John Cho Was In ‘American Pie’: “I Haven’t Seen Those”
